name: Nuclear Ascendant
description:
The world was ravaged by a nuclear war decades ago. Survivors huddle in a bunker, terrified of the unknown. They send their last robot, Atom, into the wastes to gather supplies. Atom discovers what lies outside the bunker, and what happened to the other robots...

  • Pixelated exploration game
  • Discover the wasteland's secrets and inhabitants
  • Become contaminated by nuclear oddities
  • Free yourself
  • Featuring backgrounds by Unsplash
  • Featuring sound effects by Zapsplat
  • Featuring music by Alexander Nakarada
